column1: Esta canción es inscribe demos amor a hwasa y sus canciones

Wwoah woah, where do I start. The vibe, the concept, the outfits and every emotion and details were so amazingly pulled off by Hwasa Unnie. Her powerful expressions and aura , aaah it was so profound. The instrument used in video and breaking visual at 03:06 was so dope. Loved it 💕
